text: Pozzomaggiore (Pottumajòre, Pottumaggiòre) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 2,617 people lived there. Its area is 78.77 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 438 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Pozzomaggiore
